comment: Did you know one of the biggest red flags for women on the first date is a man who constantly checks his phone?
Did you know if a man can’t decide what to wear on a date, he might want to wear blue. Studies show that women are attracted to men in blue.
Ask your partner what they like to do in their freetime.
Try asking your partner if they are more of an indoors or outdoors person.
Ask your partner: who is the most fascinating person you’ve met?
Ask your partner: what is the last book you really got into?
Ask your partner: What are some movies you really enjoyed?
Ask your partner: What amazing adventures have you been on?
Ask your partner: What pets have you had?
Ask your partner: What are you kind of obsessed with these days?
Ask your partner: Where have you traveled?
Ask your partner: What’s your favorite international food?
Ask your partner: Are you a morning person or a night owl?
Ask your partner: What’s your favorite restaurant?
Ask your partner: How many siblings do you have?
Ask your partner: What would be your dream job?
Ask your partner: What would you do if you had enough money to not need a job?
Ask your partner: Who is your favorite author?
Ask your partner: What was the last show you binge-watched?
Ask your partner: What TV series do you keep coming back to and re-watching?
Ask your partner: What hobbies would you like to get into if you had the time and money?
Ask your partner: If there was an Olympics for everyday activities, what activity would you have a good chance at winning a medal in?
Ask your partner: What would your perfect vacation look like?
Ask your partner: Among your friends, what are you best known for?
Ask your partner: What music artist do you never get tired of?
Ask your partner: What are some accomplishments that you are really proud of?
Ask your partner: What music artist do you never get tired of?
Ask your partner: What are some things everyone should try at least once?
Ask your partner: What’s the best thing that has happened to you this month?
Ask your partner: What would your perfect morning be like?
Ask your partner: What do you do to unwind?
Ask your partner: What’s your favorite app on your phone? You might mention me!
Ask your partner: Cutest animal? Ugliest animal?
Ask your partner: Who is the kindest person you know?
Ask your partner: What’s your favorite piece of furniture you’ve ever owned?
Ask your partner: What’s the silliest fear you have?
Ask your partner: What would be the best city to live in?
Ask your partner: What household chore is just the worst?
Ask your partner: If you could give yourself a nickname, what nickname would you want people to call you?
Ask your partner: What odd talent do you have?
Ask your partner: If you could give everyone just one piece of advice, what would it be?
Ask your partner: What would you like to know more about, but haven’t had the time to look into?
Ask your partner: What country do you never want to visit?
Ask your partner: If you could give everyone just one piece of advice, what would it be?
Ask your partner: Would you like to be famous?
